title: 【1.11】CS:GO 现实纹理
author: 夜頥瑿
txt_content:
本帖最后由 夜頥瑿 于 2017-1-7 17:08 编辑 

CS:GO Realistic Texture PackCSGO现实纹理材质
这个材质包添加了一些CSGO内的枪械刀具，例如爪子刀烟雾弹等物品可惜的是有些武器模型方向错误，等待作者后续更新吧
■作者原文■Enjoy CS:GO? Ever wanted to try it in Minecraft? You're at the right place! Want to know whats different? Read below! Weapons
All Weapons Have Been Changed!
Swords appear like butterfly and other knives as in csgo!
Bow appears like a sniper rifle from csgo!
Blocks
Grass has been given a more lifelike colour and texture.
Stone has become a darker variant similar lifelike.
Dirt Has become Darker so it appears more like soil.
All Woods But Acaica And Dark Oak Appear Like Floorboards in real life.
Bedrock is almost fully black to appear as it should in real life.
Red sand and sand look a little darker so sand looks beige to appear more like beach sand.
Gravel has a more filled texture.
Wood from trees appears more detailed and even shows cracks to appear as they would if the tree was cut in real life.
Leaves appear darker and have a better texture.
Wools have been given a better and brighter/darker texture.
Sponges have been given larger holes.
Iron blocks have been given a more worn look and texture.
Diamond blocks appear turqoise and have a white border.
Pumpkins and Jack o'Lanterns appear like ironman heads lit and unlit eyes (red and blue).
Hay bales have been given a real life texture.
Lapis Lazuli Ores look more realistic and blocks are a darker shade of blue.
Wood Stairs and Slabs both have the same texture as planks.
All Clays Stained have been given a better texture and colour to represent their names

■图片欣赏■





■下载地址■原贴地址：https://mods.curse.com/texture-packs/minecraft/251188-cs-go-realistic-texture-pack#t1:description备用百度云：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1o7UspEa
